title: Dimensional Chat Room - Novel Updates

tags: Angels   Chat Rooms   Cheats   Cultivation   Demons   Fanfiction   Fantasy World   Fast Cultivation   Fast Learner   Goddesses   Gods   Immortals   Jack of All Trades   Lucky Protagonist   Male Protagonist   Modern Day   Parallel Worlds   Reincarnated in Another World   Returning from Another World   Special Abilities   Transported to Another World   Weak to Strong   World Travel

description:
Blue Sky: @Flying Squirrel, did you read the red leather and yellow letter book I gave you? To build a harmonious and beautiful society. If you don’t restrain your men properly, I’ll really kick your ass.

Flying Squirrel: ∑(O_O;)

I’m (not) a Siscon: I just want Nunnally to live a normal and happy life, how can I be a siscon?

Ordinary Elementary School Student: @Walpurgisnacht? Where are you? I’ll help you.

Tokisaki Kurumi, Blank, Kira Yamato, Shana, Asuna, Yakumo Yukari, Nagato Yuki, Minato Namikaze, Rintaro Okabe… etc., the Dimensional Chat Room will lead everyone to the most perfect world line.>
